thread.title: Report: Lamar Odom is conscious and breathing on his own
thread.title_full: Report: Lamar Odom is conscious and breathing on his own

title: Report: Lamar Odom is conscious and breathing on his own
text:
[ Please stop calling Lamar Odom a ‘Kardashian reality star’ ] 
Odom has been in the hospital since Tuesday after he was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel . According to the caller who dialed 911 , Odom, who has fought drug and alcohol addiction in the past, had taken cocaine and multiple sexual-performance enhancing drugs. Marissa Payne writes for The Early Lead, a fast-breaking sports blog, where she focuses on what she calls the “cultural anthropological” side of sports, aka “mostly the fun stuff.” She is also an avid WWE fan. sports Success!
